How many people are affected by Coats plus syndrome ?,Coats plus syndrome appears to be a rare disorder. Its prevalence is unknown.,GHR,Coats plus syndrome
What are the genetic changes related to Coats plus syndrome ?,"Coats plus syndrome results from mutations in the CTC1 gene. This gene provides instructions for making a protein that plays an important role in structures known as telomeres, which are found at the ends of chromosomes.
